New Records: The Celtics matched an NBA record with 29 3-pointers
Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum scored 37 points and made 8 of the Celtics' record-tying 3-pointers
Pre-Game Insights: The Celtics raised their NBA-most 18th championship banner to the rafters before the game
Post-Match Reflections: The Celtics led by as many as 35 points before missing their last 13 3-point attempts while trying to break the record
Miscellaneous Highlights: The TD Garden crowd’s attention strayed from the basketball game and it began chanting “Yankees Suck!”
Others: Jalen Brunson scored 22 points for New York
Karl-Anthony Towns had just 12 points and seven rebounds for the Knicks
